name: Pretty Pet Salon Asian Edition
description:
Pretty Pet Salon is sure to keep you entertained with hours of pet-grooming fun!

Experience the highly-rated time management game that was downloaded for over 7 million times!

- Serve customers, earn money, and make your shop bigger and better!
- Grow your staff, and hire new employees bursting with personality and cuteness!
- Just be sure to keep an eye out for two special celebrity guest customers... they'll give your Pet Salon a real surprise!

Pretty Pet Salon now has a nifty Facebook Page! Check it out
http://www.facebook.com/PrettyPetSalon

** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. **
